column5: some nice videos from the Outdoor Passion tv showhttp://www.outdoorpassion.tv/passion_online.html

Although I watch the show every week on WFN because of the Canadian fishing destinations, I'm not a big fan of the host. He reminds me too much of the old "Mr. Rogers" kids tv show host. He talks to his audience like we're a bunch of two year olds. I prefer a more professional host that can explain things in a more adult tone.
